      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) java.lang.String Strategy.altStrategy(Hand h)
      Strategy used when a split is the next best move but can't be performed.
      Constructors in classes with parameters of type Hand 
      Constructor and Description
      Basic(Hand h1, Hand h2)
      Creates a basic strategy receives two hands, the dealer's and player's.
      HiLo(Hand h1, Hand h2)
      Creates a high-low strategy receives two hands, the dealer's and player's, and sets the local variables to zero.
      Strategy(Hand h1, Hand h2)
      Constructor for the Strategy class.
